amendment.description: Relative to the review of IT and 2010 Census-related activities at the Bureau of the Census.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3272 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3272 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S12846; text: CR S12846) Relative to the review of IT and 2010 Census-related activities at the Bureau of the Census.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3272 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3272 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Shelby.
